title: Children of the Kern sale. 50 percent off Sibyl
content:
It’s that time of year again. October, and time to harvest the kern...um...corn. Wielding the sickle recalls the sage advice given by your father, [“Trust everyone,” he said, “but cut the corn!”](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905043305/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/sibyl/)

If only life were that simple.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905043305im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/childkern_6654.gif)

By the time you got back to the farm house the children had taken over the town, exiled all grown-ups and declared, “Enough with corn! From now on we worship the Kern God!”

[To commemorate the Children of the Kern this Halloween, I’ve slashed Sibyl Schwabacher to half price. Sale ends October 31st 2007.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905043305/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/sibyl/)

So those two kiddies, they’re closely kerned, right? And the little girl is holding a side bearing ;^)

j a m e s
author: James Arboghast

comments.content: That percent sign is looking good, hee. ; )
